db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:listitem.db:para: TreeViewStyle is part of Styling ViewsStyling Controls

db:section.db:title: branchDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: This property defines a delegate to draw the branch indicator.
In the branch delegate you have access to the following special properties:

db:listitem.db:para: styleData.row - the index of the view row
styleData.column - the index of the view column. Will always be 0
styleData.selected - if the item is currently selected
styleData.textColor - the default text color for an item
styleData.index - the QModelIndex of the current item in the model
styleData.depth - the depth of the current item in the tree model
styleData.isExpanded - true when the item is expanded
styleData.hasChildren - true if the model index of the current item has children
styleData.hasSibling - true if the model index of the current item has sibling

db:section.db:title: control : TreeView
db:section.db:para: The TreeView this style is attached to.

db:section.db:title: headerDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Delegate for header. This delegate is described in TreeView.headerDelegate.

db:section.db:title: highlightedTextColor : color
db:section.db:para: The text highlight color, used within selections.

db:section.db:title: indentation : int
db:section.db:para: The amount each level is indented relatively to its parent level.

db:section.db:title: itemDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Delegate for item. This delegate is described in TreeView.itemDelegate.

db:section.db:title: padding group
db:section.db:para: This grouped property holds the top, left, right and bottom padding.

db:section.db:title: rowDelegate : Component
db:section.db:para: Delegate for row. This delegate is described in TreeView.rowDelegate.
